summary:
Inspired by Lou's recent post, Food Memories Are The Best, we got talking about our favourite memories of food and how we both love reading other people's trips down memory lane. 
Unlike Lou, I never really knew either of my grandmothers so I couldn't tell you if they even knew how to cook.  I met my dad's mum when I was little but, by then, she was in her late 60s and seem to live off Tunnock's Tea Cakes and tea she brewed on a paraffin stove she kept next to her chair...
title: For Love & Food
